C

close() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method for closing the connection.
close() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
close() - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
close() - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
Method that closes a connection to a database component of the system using the JDBS technology
connect() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method that enables the connection to the database;
connect() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
connect() - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
connect() - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
Method that establishes a connection to the database component of the system using the JDBS technology
createItem(Item) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to create an Item or retrieve it from the database if it already exists; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; The result is either a Item, mapped from the ResultSet of the PreparedStatement or null if the procedure resulted in an Exception due to failure
createItem(Item) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
createItem(Item) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to add a new item to the system; The method returns the Item object obtain after insertion (with only persistence generated data)
createItem(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
 
createParty(Party) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to create a new instance of a Party in the database system.
createParty() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
createParty(Party) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
createParty(Party) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to create a new Party and insert it in the system data; The method returns the Party object obtained after the insertion (contains persistence only generated data)
createParty(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
Calls createSockets() in preparation to sending a Package command; Sends out the package using the ObjectOutputStream variable; The method waits for the result Party which it received using the ObjectInputStream variable; The socket connection is closed and the result is being returned.
createParty(Party) - Method in class server.ModelManager
Method used to create a new Party in the system.
createParty(Party) - Method in class server.PartyPlannerService
Method used to create a party at the request of an HttpClient; The Party parameter is provided by the web service and serialized using JSON; It references the ModelManager object to execute the command and retrive the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a Party object, meaning the object has been created successfully or null, meaning the procedure failed and was aborted
createPerson(Person) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to create a new instance of a person in the Database; Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; After insertion the method retrieves in similar steps the Person object obtained after the database insertion (with only persistence data generated)
createPerson() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
createPerson(Person) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
createPerson(Person) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to add a new user/Person to the system.
createPerson(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
